summary: Iteration 10: Frontend testing of Dashboard UI redesign. All requested features verified: 4 quick actions (Report, Fit, Doctor, News), 3-item bottom nav (Home, News, Wall), Wall Widget with latest post, Benefits slider with 4 cards, Groups section, and public/private group toggle in Citizen Wall.

minor.issue: Returns 404 - may need admin to create story ads first
Returns 404 - may need admin to create news ads first

passed_tests: Dashboard - Quick actions have exactly 4 buttons: Report, Fit, Doctor, News
Dashboard - Removed quick actions (Dump, Wall, AI Chat) are NOT present
Dashboard - Bottom navigation has exactly 3 items: Home, News, Wall
Dashboard - Removed nav items (Issues, Kaizer Fit) are NOT present
Dashboard - Wall Widget visible with 'Citizen Wall' header and latest post
Dashboard - Benefits slider shows 4 benefit cards (Senior Pension, Health Camp, Education Scholarship, Ration Card)
Dashboard - Groups section visible with user's groups
Dashboard - Stories bar visible at top
News page - Loads news articles successfully
News page - Category pills working (Local, City, State, National, etc.)
News page - Swipe navigation working (shows article count)
Citizen Wall - Feed tab shows posts with likes/comments
Citizen Wall - Groups tab shows My Groups and Discover Groups
Citizen Wall - Create Group dialog has public/private toggle checkbox
Citizen Wall - Private toggle label: 'ప్రైవేట్ గ్రూప్ (ఆహ్వానం మాత్రమే)' (Private group - invite only)
critical_code_review_comments: Dashboard.jsx properly implements 4 quick actions with correct data-testid attributes
Layout.jsx correctly shows 3-item bottom nav (Home, News, Wall)
Wall Widget shows latest post from /api/wall/posts?limit=1
Benefits section uses static cards with images from Unsplash
CitizenWall.jsx has public/private group toggle with is_private checkbox
NewsShorts.jsx has admin ads injection logic (every 5 articles) but ads endpoint returns 404
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dashboard UI redesign complete. Quick actions: Report, Fit, Doctor, News (4 buttons). Bottom nav: Home, News, Wall (3 items). Wall Widget shows latest post. Benefits slider has 4 static cards. Groups section visible. Citizen Wall has public/private group toggle. News page loads articles with category filtering. Admin ads injection logic exists but ads endpoints return 404 (need admin to create ads).

wall_widget.details: Shows 'Citizen Wall' header with latest post from API

public_private_groups.details: Create Group dialog has checkbox for 'Private group (invite only)'

news_page.details: Loads news articles with category filtering, swipe navigation

admin_ads_injection.status: LOGIC EXISTS - NO ADS IN DB
admin_ads_injection.details: NewsShorts.jsx has logic to inject ads every 5 articles, but /api/stories/ads/news returns 404

mocked_apis.admin_ads: Will only show if admin creates them via API
